title: 'You're Trying To Turn This Into Debate': Sparks Fly As Trump Pressed On Fears About U.S. Currency
description:
Former President Trump all but debates Bloomberg News Editor-in-Chief John Micklethwait about endangering the U.S. as a reserve currency at a Bloomberg News and The Economic Club of Chicago event in Chicago, Illinois.
